comments.raw_text:
The HidesRecipients boolean in an nsIAbDirectory mailing list is for indicating whether or not recipient addresses should be visible to all recipients.

Currently, when HidesRecipients is true, sending mail to that mailing list simply puts the recipient addresses into the BCC field.  We should probably use the group syntax instead.
